TopicTitle: I just started a new save on my old favorite game, Kingdom Hearts: Chain of Memories

Articles.Content:
And this game is awesome. I now realized that I had meant to complete it when I was in elementary school, but stopped playing after I got past the plant boss.

I think I have to finish it.

Some screencaps from my first session.

![5Xl78dQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/5Xl78dQ.png)

![Y05k23n.png](http://i.imgur.com/Y05k23n.png)

And I'm starting from a fresh save.

I'm on this dragon boss or something. I can't beat it.

Although, this game is pretty cool.
